com.commercetools.sunrise.payment.utils

Interface PaymentPropertiesLoadingHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaymentPropertiesLoadingHelperImpl

    public interface PaymentPropertiesLoadingHelper
    Provides helper methods to easily parse a payment method configuration file. Created by mgatz on 7/19/16.
